alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Jones; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 7:47AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, northwestern Wilkinson, Twiggs, south central Hancock, northeastern Houston and southeastern Jones Counties through 815 AM EST... At 747 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Pancras to Warner Robins, and moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Jeffersonville, Warner Robins, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Robins AFB, Midway-Hardwick, Marion, Beulah, Robins Air Force Base, Allenwood, Mountain Springs, District Path, Hardwick, Coopers, Underwood, Bullard, Linton and Fitzpatrick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for central and east central Georgia.
